Description.Name: Gambling Debt Collectors Came
Description.Details: The day after your eighteenth birthday, you got fired from the company after a hostile encounter with the collectors sent for your gambling debts.

OptionName: Your gambling debts got you fired.
OptionDescription:
As you finally earned an income for the first time, your inexperience led you to gambling that quickly accumulated until collectors were sent after you.

Unwilling to take the risk, your CO decided to fire. You escaped with the bandit king's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralPhoenixHawk],Phoenix Hawk]] left to call your own, and set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
BioDescription: Once a promising ex-slave, your new found freedom became wasted in debt from gambling, until the collectors threatened the company. You took the bandit king's Phoenix Hawk you stole from your former dead master and set off to find a new life to call your own.
